RibbonStyle Class Reference

(Qtitan::RibbonStyle)

RibbonStyle class inherits from a class OfficeStyle. The class is the style for rendering Ribbon UI specific primitives. More...

    #include <Qtitan>

Inherits OfficeStyle.

  • List of all members, including inherited members

Public Types

enum QContentsType { CT_RibbonSliderButton, CT_RibbonGroupButton }
enum QControlElement { CE_RibbonTabShapeLabel, CE_RibbonFileButtonLabel, CE_RibbonBar, CE_RibbonGroups, ..., CE_PopupSizeGrip }
enum QPixelMetric { PM_RibbonReducedGroupWidth, PM_RibbonHeightGroup, PM_RibbonHeightCaptionGroup, PM_RibbonTabsHeight }
enum QPrimitiveElement { PE_RibbonPopupBarButton, PE_RibbonFileButton, PE_RibbonOptionButton, PE_RibbonSliderButton, ..., PE_Backstage }
enum QStyleHint { SH_FlatFrame }

Detailed Description

RibbonStyle class inherits from a class OfficeStyle. The class is the style for rendering Ribbon UI specific primitives.

Member Type Documentation

enum RibbonStyle::QContentsType

enum RibbonStyle::QControlElement

enum RibbonStyle::QPixelMetric

enum RibbonStyle::QPrimitiveElement

enum RibbonStyle::QStyleHint
